summary: Standalone Follower based on Mvpbeserker's character.  Available in UNP, UNPB, and CBBE
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1155cc][size=6]Mvpbeserker's Elise

[/size][/color][/font][font=Verdana]Based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/7936616/?]Mvpbeserker's[/url] Character Elise
Permission granted for follower creation.
[/font]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3jwctx9mv/svrPpqe.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/6rdva9czr/Story.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Elise was born to a commoner consort and the Emperor, Titus Mede II.  Raised in the Imperial palace with all of the pure blood
heirs, she was hated and mocked for her impurity.  Her mother being a commoner meant that their family had no political clout
and were at the mercy of the Imperial court.  Elise grew up isolated, devoting herself to mastering the art of the greatsword.

Shortly after her 19th name-day, Elise's mother was assassinated by a rival family.  With nothing left to keep her in Cyrodiil, she broke into the royal armory; acquiring an ancient set of armor and a legendary zweilhander.

Upon catching wind of rumors about dragons in Skyrim, she departed Cyrodiil on a warship headed for Solitude.  The journey was fraught with dangers, but she was determined to meet her fate in the unforgiving land of Ysgramor.

~After the long perilous journey, she can be found resting at the Winking Skeever in Solitude~[/font]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Name:  Elise
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1
Weight:  28
Body:  UNP, UNPB, CBBE
*Non-Tattoo Version Now Available*
Skin:  Fair Skin
Location:  Solitude - Winking Skeever
Armor:  Demon Hunter
Weapon:  Sword of the Ancient Tongues

Class:  Combat Barbarian
Style:  Boss Two Handed
Levels with Player
Two Handed Perks.  Bonuses to Two Handed, Sneak, Light Armor

Tested with EFF[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/afbzzaepz/OlnvGKR.jpg[/img]

[youtube]LUTrFFn4ciU[/youtube]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]

[/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Some users had issues with hair clipping through helmets, hoods, etc.

[/font]*There is no HDT built in this follower; if you're experiencing stretching/invisibility issues please check your HDT Physics
as this is a common HDT issue.  Thank You*
